attributes.action: The UK Government must urge Israel to restore power and open Rafah Gaza Border
attributes.additional_details: The civilians of Gaza are under military attack, food, power and water has been cut off. Humanitarian aid is piling up on the Egyptian side of the Rafah border crossing. We must push Israel for the opening of the Rafah border crossing. Egypt hopes to restore regular operations through the Rafah, including for Palestinians seeking medical treatment in Egypt and getting foreign nationals on flights home. Please support this petition.
attributes.background: A humanitarian disaster is unfolding in Gaza. Following the Hamas terrorist attacks on Israel on 7/10 Israel has cut off water, power and supplies to Gaza along with a military campaign.  We urge the UK government to urge Israel to re-open Rafah border and  restore power and water to Gaza.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge the Israel Government to allow fuel, electricity and food into Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383

Call for Israel to immediately establish a humanitarian corridor in Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648642
